items.text: full on off stump, leans into it and taps it to mid-off's left to pinch a single
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short of a length in the corridor, taps it into the off side from deep in the crease
items.shortText: Holder to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: length ball at middle stump, tapped to mid-on from the crease
items.postText: Bilal Aslam: "@Shaun if Tamim had made 40 instead of 130 in the first match, then Bangladesh would have surelly lost. That wasn't his personal inning, but for the team. I think the pitches aren't that easy here to bat, so sometimes just a bit more patience and boring bating can win you a game."
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short and wide outside off, late slice to backward point's right. Can't get it past him
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length ball down leg side, head falls over into the off side as he stretches to flick this. Gets it wide of fine leg whose dive to the right is not quick enough
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: nicely done. Length ball outside off, leans in calmly as he punches this on the up. It bounces away wide of mid-off and teases the two fielders running after it before getting to the boundary
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: length at the stumps, tapped to midwicket off the front foot
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length ball outside off, left alone
items.postText:
Allysa Lum Hoo: "Tamim heard you Shaun! Hoping to see a great game today just like the last one."

Robin: "Tamim like other senior players know how quickly Bangladesh Batting line colups and that's why he's been playing slow. We all know his capabilities and yeah it's a team game so let them play according to their plan. "
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short of a length just outside off, defended off the back foot
items.shortText: Holder to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: sound as this goes through to the keeper down leg side. It's a length ball on leg stump that he's trying to glance. Not out says the umpire. That was off the thigh guard.
items.shortText: Holder to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: length on leg stump, flicked to square leg's right
items.shortText: Holder to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, nudged to mid-on's right on the up
items.shortText: Holder to Anamul Haque, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, blocked with soft hands to get a single to cover's left
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short of a length outside off, tapped to cover off the back foot
items.shortText: Holder to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: overpitched and in at middle stump. A firm punch to mid-on
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length ball on off stump, climbs up as he gets in for the defence. Manages to drop it into the pitch
items.postText: the ball has slipped out of Cottrell's hand again. This time it'll be a dead ball. It's gone towards extra cover.
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: falls safely after pinging off his glove. Short of a length ball on leg stump and he's hurried on the pull. It lobs up for the keeper to his right but is quite far away in the end
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short of a length in the corridor, mistimed dab into the off side gives them the chance to pick up a single
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: length on middle stump, flicked to square leg's right
items.shortText: Cottrell to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, watchfully poked into the covers
items.shortText: Cottrell to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: clears mid-off and Tamim survives again. Steps out at this length ball outside off and has an ugly swipe while losing his shape. Powell picks it a second late and can't get close to it running backwards as it's sliced off the face of the bat
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: length on leg stump, clipped through square leg
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: length ball in the corridor, angled inwards. Gets forward and blocks
items.shortText: Holder to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: length ball in the corridor, solidly blocked on the front foot
items.shortText: Holder to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: offcutter a length on leg stump, deflected to fine leg's right off the front foot
items.shortText: Holder to Anamul Haque, 1 run
